DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether functional electrical stimulation ( FES ) promote neurological physical recovery patient spinal cord injury ( SCI ) . The researcher investigate extent functional recovery patient spinal cord injury receive functional electrical stimulation upper extremity compare patient receive FES .
DOC.brief_title: Patterned Functional Electrical Stimulation ( FES ) Ergometry Arm Shoulder Individuals With Spinal Cord Injury
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize , control , single-blinded , in-subject control ( A-B type ) trial perform patient SCI receive upper extremity non-FES assist exercise protocol compare patient receive upper extremity ergometry combination FES . Neurological functional outcome measure obtain baseline ( time 0 ) , 1st 4 month intervention ( 4 month ) , 1 month washout ( 5 month ) , 2nd 4 month intervention ( 9 month ) , 3 month complete last intervention ( 12 month ) .
